Name: assign_worker_to_team
Description: Binary variable indicating if worker w is assigned to team t.

Name: assign_user_story_to_sprint
Description: Binary variable indicating if user story us is assigned to sprint sp.

Name: assign_task_to_worker
Description: Binary variable indicating if task tsk is assigned to worker w.

Name: assign_feature_to_release
Description: Binary variable indicating if feature f is included in release plan rep.

Name: select_team_size
Description: Integer variable for the number of members in a team t.

Name: sprint_start_date
Description: Date variable for the start of a sprint sp.

Name: allocate_worker_availability
Description: Float variable for the percentage of a worker's time allocated to a project.

Name: rank_user_story_in_backlog
Description: Integer representing the rank of a user story us in the product backlog.

Name: set_sprint_duration
Description: Integer for the length of a sprint in weeks.

Name: assign_worker_to_role
Description: Binary variable indicating if worker w takes on role r in team t.

Name: set_project_priority
Description: Integer value representing the priority of a project p.

Name: determine_story_points
Description: Integer value for the estimated story points of a user story us.

Name: choose_task_type
Description: Categorical variable for the type of a task (e.g., Development, Testing, Documentation).
